General.Name: Cheetah Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Cheetah Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, designs, develops, markets, and retails various garments and apparels, clothing, footwear, and accessories in Malaysia. It offers sports apparel and accessories, as well as casual wear for men, ladies, and children. The company offers its products through cheetah.com.my, as well as other online platforms, such as Shopee, Lazada, Zalora, XOX Black Market, and Lamboplace. It distributes its products under the Cheetah Sports, Cheetah Unlimited, Cheetah Ladies, Cheetah Junior, C. Union, C2 United, Baby Cheetah, and Arissa brands. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Seri Kembangan, Malaysia.
